intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: I'm a Backend + Data + AI Engineer passionate about system design and building scalable, event-driven architectures. I currently work at Avesta Technologies where I am currently designing RAG-based chatbots and serverless data processing pipelines using AWS Lambda, PostgreSQL, and Elasticsearch. I strongly believe in writing clean code, practicing with test-driven development, and building systems that are reliable, performant, and easy to maintain.

Avesta Technologies.achievements: Currently building an RAG-based pipeline for a knowledge-based chatbot using event-driven architecture;Implemented AWS Lambda functions to process/manage data from PostgreSQL and Elasticsearch;Built serverless backend systems with a focus on cost-efficiency, scalability, and clean code;Practiced TDD, modular development, and layered design principles

Avesta Technologies Intern.achievements: Developed RESTful APIs using Node.js + Express with focus on OOP and TDD;Applied system design principles for scalable applications;Hands-on experience with MySQL, Elasticsearch, AWS services, and Linux;Focused on clean architecture, efficient data flow, and production-grade code
